# Environmental Testing Lab Services

**Contract Opportunity ID:** cb-772-94391949
**Description:**
The Department of National Defence is seeking a contractor to provide laboratory analytical services for occupational and environmental testing on an as-needed basis. 

## Description
The successful contractor must be able to provide accredited laboratory services, including:

* Supply and shipping of testing media for sample collection
* Performance of testing on environmental samples collected by the Canadian Armed Forces
* Analysis of collected samples
* Delivery of final reports

## Contract Details

* **Contract Reference:** cb-772-94391949
* ** Solicitation Number:** W6369-23-A081\B
* **Closing Date:** 2024-07-15 14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr., Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

## Requirements and Eligibility
Eligible contractors must be able to provide laboratory services in accordance with established standards and procedures.

## Evaluation Criteria
The contracting entity will evaluate contractor proposals based on the lowest price.

## Business Opportunities
The Canadian government has extensive business relationships with countries around the world. This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
